column2: the more luck I seem to have. Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower. Multi-threading Success is not in what you have
column3: but who you are. Success doesn’t just find you. You have to go out and get it. Backend Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it. JWT Dream big and dare to fail. Great things never come from comfort zones. Containerization
